meanings.definition: To give special importance or prominence to something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher emphasises the importance of reading.
meanings.sent2: She always emphasises the need for teamwork.
meanings.sent3: The cat emphasises its hunger by meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: His red tie emphasises his confidence in public speaking.
meanings.sent5: The bright spotlight emphasises the lead singer on stage.

meanings.definition: To stress or highlight a particular point.
meanings.sent1: During the presentation, he emphasises the key facts.
meanings.sent2: The coach emphasises the importance of practice.
meanings.sent3: The clown emphasises his big shoes by dancing comically.
meanings.sent4: Her smile emphasises her joy in the photograph.
meanings.sent5: The bold font emphasises the title on the cover.

meanings.definition: To make something more noticeable or significant.
meanings.sent1: The artist emphasises the contrast in his painting.
meanings.sent2: The designer emphasises the unique features of the dress.
meanings.sent3: The chef emphasises the flavor of the dish with fresh herbs.
meanings.sent4: The thunder emphasises the power of the storm.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors emphasise the beauty of the garden.
